name: SOSCIENCE
goal: We are service providers in Responsible Research and Innovation: we develop research programs that answer societal needs. We work with both private and public structure. In public structure, we launch partnerships between social entrepreneurs and laboratories in order to co-create new products. In private structure we train scientists and technical collaborator, set up teams and manage a responsible research project. We enable the emergence of scientific innovations with positive impacts.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
- European project: RRI Tools
- Policies concerning Responsible Research and Innovation, especially in the current H2020 program
